item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Low Volume Scalps - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Low Volume Scalps - NEWSBTC

Here's a look at what we are focusing on in the bitcoin price this morning. As far as Monday sessions go, this one is likely to be uneventful. The holidays in the US look set to dampen volume, and in turn, put a cap on any sustained momentum or volatility in the bitcoin price.

item.title: Zugs bitcoin pilot project kicks off - EconoTimes
item.description:
Zugs bitcoin pilot project kicks off - EconoTimes

Digital Currency Zug's bitcoin pilot project kicks off Monday, July 4, 2016 9:02 AM UTC According to latest reports, the residents of the city of Zug, Switzerland can now pay their fees in digital currency bitcoin. With this, Zug, also known as "Crypto Valley", has become the first locality in the world to accept bitcoin payments.

item.title: Ukraine to Host World's First Blockchain-based Auction
item.description:
Ukraine to Host World's First Blockchain-based Auction

It is interesting to note this idea has the full support of the Ukrainian government. An agreement for this blockchain-based auction platform.was reached in March of 2016. Blockchain technology can be used in a wide variety of ways. Over in Ukraine, they are preparing for the world's first blockchain-based auction.

item.title: Never Waste A Crisis: Merkel Peddles A Superstate
item.description:
Never Waste A Crisis: Merkel Peddles A Superstate

A recent document called "A strong Europe in a world of uncertainties" sketches out a harmonized Superstate that envisions the joining of 27 current EU members. "The euro reflects our commitment to the irreversibility of European integration. However, we must admit that the crisis and its aftermath...

item.title: "With Bitcoin, We're Sending a Message," Says Swiss Town Mayor
item.description:
"With Bitcoin, We're Sending a Message," Says Swiss Town Mayor

It was early May when the Swiss town of Zug convened a city council meeting. By the end of it, bitcoin was accepted as a valid mode of payment for municipality services, part of a pilot program.

item.title: Federal Agent Charged in Silk Road Bitcoin Theft Accused of Stealing More
item.description:
Federal Agent Charged in Silk Road Bitcoin Theft Accused of Stealing More

The former Secret Service agent convicted in the theft of Bitcoin from the Silk Road during their investigation is accused of stealing even more than previously thought. According to newly released documents, Shaun Bridges, one of two federal agents caught stealing during the Silk Road investigations, is accused by prosecutors of stealing an additional $700,000 worth of Bitcoin.

item.title: Which language is bitcoin created in?
item.description:
Which language is bitcoin created in?

A severed horse head was sent to our room, and we got trapped in an elevator, in the same hostel. It was a very cheap place in Athens. I was bunking in a dorm for a few nights with some friends.

item.title: Kraken Acquires Dutch Bitcoin Exchange CleverCoin
item.description:
Kraken Acquires Dutch Bitcoin Exchange CleverCoin

Dutch Bitcoin exchange, CleverCoin has been acquired by the popular San-Francisco Bitcoin exchange, Kraken just months after getting Cavirtex and Coinsetter, also Bitcoin exchanges. After acquiring two exchanges already, Kraken still seemed to be looking to expand its user base and decided to merge the popular Netherlands-based exchange into Kraken which allows Kraken to expand into Europe.

item.title: The Last Ticket to BIP001 to Be Sold via Decentralized Blockchain Auction
item.description:
The Last Ticket to BIP001 to Be Sold via Decentralized Blockchain Auction

The last ticket to blockchain conference BIP001 to be held in the city of Odessa July 7 will be sold via blockchain platform eAuction. The platform has been developed for privatization of public property and other auctions. The auction will be powered by five trade platforms, including Pavel Kravchenko of Distributed Lab commented: "Why this auction?

item.title: Citibank study on Bitcoin: read here their report on digital currencies | HolyTransaction
item.description:
Citibank study on Bitcoin: read here their report on digital currencies | HolyTransaction

A few days ago the Citibank study on Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies was released, where it explains that they should not be considered as disruptive for banks and other traditional institutions.
